alert.note: Alert for Kiowa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 31 at 3:29PM MDT until May 31 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 329 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Chivington, or 21 miles north of Lamar, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Chivington. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
